verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD רֵ֖ד <WH3381> Go down בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> to the house מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <WH1696> and speak שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> and there אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> there this word הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> And say שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> O king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah הַיֹּשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> that sittest עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> upon the throne דָוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you וַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> thou and thy servants וְעַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> and thy people הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> that enter בַּשְּׁעָרִ֥ים <WH8179> in by these gates הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD עֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> Execute מִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> ye judgment וּצְדָקָ֔ה <WH6666> and righteousness וְהַצִּ֥ילוּ <WH5337> and deliver גָז֖וּל <WH1497> the spoiled מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> out of the hand עָשׁ֑וֹק <WH6216> of the oppressor וְגֵר֩ <WH1616> to the stranger יָת֨וֹם <WH3490> the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֤ה <WH490> nor the widow אַל־ <WH408> nay תֹּנוּ֙ <WH3238> and do no wrong אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּחְמֹ֔סוּ <WH2554> do no violence וְדָ֣ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֔י <WH5355> innocent אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁפְּכ֖וּ <WH8210> neither shed בַּמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> if עָשׂוֹ֙ <WH6213> For if ye do תַּֽעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> indeed אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וּבָ֣אוּ <WH935> then shall there enter in בְשַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> by the gates הַבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> of this house הַזֶּ֡ה <WH2088> of this מְלָכִים֩ <WH4428> kings יֹשְׁבִ֨ים <WH3427> sitting לְדָוִ֜ד <WH1732> of David עַל־ <WH5921> upon כִּסְא֗וֹ <WH3678> upon the throne רֹֽכְבִים֙ <WH7392> riding בָּרֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> in chariots וּבַסּוּסִ֔ים <WH5483> and on horses ה֥וּא <WH1931> himself [וְעַבְדָו כ] (וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> bondage ק) וְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> and his people

וְאִם֙ <WH518> if לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תִשְׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> But if ye will not hear אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these בִּ֤י נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH7650> I swear נְאֻם־ <WH5002> by myself saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for לְחָרְבָּ֥ה <WH2723> shall become a desolation יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> will become הַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> that this house הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> concerning בֵּית֙ <WH1004> house מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king's יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah גִּלְעָ֥ד <WH1568> Thou [art] Gilead אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you לִ֖י רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> unto me [and] the head הַלְּבָנ֑וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֤א <WH3808> not אֲשִֽׁיתְךָ֙ <WH7896> [yet] surely I will make מִדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> thee a wilderness עָרִ֖ים <WH5892> [and] cities לֹ֥א <WH3808> not [נֹושָׁבָה כ] (נֹושָֽׁבוּ׃ <WH3427> abide ק)

וְקִדַּשְׁתִּ֥י <WH6942> And I will prepare עָלֶ֛יךָ <WH5921> against מַשְׁחִתִ֖ים <WH7843> destroyers אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> against thee every one וְכֵלָ֑יו <WH3627> with his weapons וְכָֽרְתוּ֙ <WH3772> and they shall cut down מִבְחַ֣ר <WH4005> thy choice אֲרָזֶ֔יךָ <WH730> cedars וְהִפִּ֖ילוּ <WH5307> and cast עַל־ <WH5921> against הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> [them] into the fire

וְעָֽבְרוּ֙ <WH5674> shall pass גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> And many עַ֖ל <WH5921> and הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> by this city הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> and they וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and they shall say אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶל־ <WH413> about רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> to his neighbour עַל־ <WH5921> and מֶ֨ה <WH4100> how long עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> done יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Wherefore hath the LORD כָּ֔כָה <WH3602> thus לָעִ֥יר <WH5892> city הַגְּדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> thus unto this great הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> they

וְאָ֣מְר֔וּ <WH559> Then they shall answer עַ֚ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they עָֽזְב֔וּ <WH5800> Because they have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> the covenant יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֛וּ <WH7812> and worshipped לֵאלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> other וַיַּעַבְדֽוּם׃ <WH5647> and served ס

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּבְכּ֣וּ <WH1058> Weep לְמֵ֔ת <WH4191> ye not for the dead וְאַל־ <WH408> not תָּנֻ֖דוּ <WH5110> neither bemoan ל֑וֹ בְּכ֤וּ <WH1058> him [but] weep בָכוֹ֙ <WH1058> sore לַֽהֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> for him that goeth away כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> for he shall return ע֔וֹד <WH5750> Or וְרָאָ֖ה <WH7200> no more nor see אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> country מוֹלַדְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4138> his native ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה <WH3541> thus אָֽמַר־ <WH559> For thus saith יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> touching שַׁלֻּ֨ם <WH7967> Shallum בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֜הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah הַמֹּלֵךְ֙ <WH4427> which reigned תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> the place יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <WH2977> instead of Josiah אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יָצָ֖א <WH3318> which went forth מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> out of this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> He shall not return שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again

כִּ֗י <WH3588> in בִּמְק֛וֹם <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they הִגְל֥וּ <WH1540> whither they have led him captive אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there יָמ֑וּת <WH4191> But he shall die וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> this land הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise לֹֽא־ <WH3808> and not יִרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> and shall see עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again ס

ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Woe בֹּנֶ֤ה <WH1129> unto him that buildeth בֵיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> his house בְּֽלֹא־ <WH3808> by צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> unrighteousness וַעֲלִיּוֹתָ֖יו <WH5944> and his chambers בְּלֹ֣א <WH3808> without מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> by wrong בְּרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> [that] useth his neighbour's יַעֲבֹ֣ד <WH5647> service חִנָּ֔ם <WH2600> without wages וּפֹעֲל֖וֹ <WH6467> him not for his work לֹ֥א <WH3808> without יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> and giveth לֽוֹ׃

הָאֹמֵ֗ר <WH559> That saith אֶבְנֶה־ <WH1129> I will build לִּי֙ בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house מִדּ֔וֹת <WH4060> me a wide וַעֲלִיּ֖וֹת <WH5944> chambers מְרֻוָּחִ֑ים <WH7304> and large וְקָ֤רַֽע <WH7167> and cutteth him out לוֹ֙ חַלּוֹנָ֔י <WH2474> windows וְסָפ֣וּן <WH5603> and [it is] cieled בָּאָ֔רֶז <WH730> with cedar וּמָשׁ֖וֹחַ <WH4886> and painted בַּשָּׁשַֽׁר׃ <WH8350> with vermilion

הֲתִֽמְלֹ֔ךְ <WH4427> Shalt thou reign כִּ֥י <WH3588> because אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you מְתַחֲרֶ֣ה <WH8474> because thou closest בָאָ֑רֶז <WH730> cedar אָבִ֜יךָ <WH1> fathers הֲל֧וֹא <WH3808> not אָכַ֣ל <WH398> eat וְשָׁתָ֗ה <WH8354> and drink וְעָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> and do מִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> judgment וּצְדָקָ֔ה <WH6666> and justice אָ֖ז <WH227> for ט֥וֹב <WH2896> [and] then [it was] well לֽוֹ׃

דָּ֛ן <WH1777> He judged דִּין־ <WH1779> the cause עָנִ֥י <WH6041> of the poor וְאֶבְי֖וֹן <WH34> and needy אָ֣ז <WH227> Then ט֑וֹב <WH2896> then [it was] well הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> not הִ֛יא <WH1931> he הַדַּ֥עַת <WH1847> [with him was] not this to know אֹתִ֖י <WH853> נְאֻם־ <WH5002> me? saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֤ין <WH369> But עֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> But thine eyes וְלִבְּךָ֔ <WH3820> and thine heart כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo עַל־ <WH5921> upon בִּצְעֶ֑ךָ <WH1215> [are] not but for thy covetousness וְעַ֤ל <WH5921> and דַּֽם־ <WH1818> blood הַנָּקִי֙ <WH5355> innocent לִשְׁפּ֔וֹךְ <WH8210> and for to shed וְעַל־ <WH5921> and הָעֹ֥שֶׁק <WH6233> and for oppression וְעַל־ <WH5921> and הַמְּרוּצָ֖ה <WH4835> and for violence לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> to do ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> regard יְהוֹיָקִ֤ים <WH3079> concerning Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah לֹא־ <WH3808> They will not יִסְפְּד֣וּ <WH5594> They shall not lament ל֔וֹ ה֥וֹי <WH1945> for him [saying] Ah אָחִ֖י <WH251> my brother וְה֣וֹי <WH1945> or Ah אָח֑וֹת <WH269> sister לֹא־ <WH3808> They will not יִסְפְּד֣וּ <WH5594> they shall not lament ל֔וֹ ה֥וֹי <WH1945> for him [saying] Ah אָד֖וֹן <WH113> lord וְה֥וֹי <WH1945> or Ah הֹדֹֽה׃ <WH1935> his glory

קְבוּרַ֥ת <WH6900> with the burial חֲמ֖וֹר <WH2543> of an ass יִקָּבֵ֑ר <WH6912> He shall be buried סָח֣וֹב <WH5498> drawn וְהַשְׁלֵ֔ךְ <WH7993> and cast forth מֵהָ֖לְאָה <WH1973> beyond לְשַׁעֲרֵ֥י <WH8179> the gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem ס

עֲלִ֤י <WH5927> Go up הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> to Lebanon וּֽצְעָ֔קִי <WH6817> and cry וּבַבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> in Bashan תְּנִ֣י <WH5414> and lift up קוֹלֵ֑ךְ <WH6963> thy voice וְצַֽעֲקִי֙ <WH6817> and cry מֵֽעֲבָרִ֔ים <WH5682> Abarim כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <WH7665> are destroyed כָּל־ <WH3605> for all מְאַהֲבָֽיִךְ׃ <WH157> for all thy lovers

דִּבַּ֤רְתִּי <WH1696> I spake אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH413> to you בְּשַׁלְוֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH7962> unto thee in thy prosperity אָמַ֖רְתְּ <WH559> [but] thou saidst לֹ֣א <WH3808> you have not אֶשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> I will not hear זֶ֤ה <WH2088> he דַרְכֵּךְ֙ <WH1870> This [hath been] thy manner מִנְּעוּרַ֔יִךְ <WH5271> from thy youth כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> you have not שָׁמַ֖עַתְּ <WH8085> that thou obeyedst בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> not my voice

כָּל־ <WH3605> all רֹעַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH7462> shall eat up תִּרְעֶה־ <WH7462> all thy pastors ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> The wind וּֽמְאַהֲבַ֖יִךְ <WH157> and thy lovers בַּשְּׁבִ֣י <WH7628> into captivity יֵלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> will go כִּ֣י <WH3588> will surely אָ֤ז <WH227> Then תֵּבֹ֙שִׁי֙ <WH954> surely then shalt thou be ashamed וְנִכְלַ֔מְתְּ <WH3637> and confounded מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> of all רָעָתֵֽךְ׃ <WH7451> for all thy wickedness

[יֹשַׁבְתִּי כ] (יֹשַׁבְתְּ֙ <WH3427> abide ק) בַּלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon [מְקֻנַּנְתִּי כ] (מְקֻנַּ֖נְתְּ <WH7077> make ק) בָּֽאֲרָזִ֑ים <WH730> in the cedars מַה־ <WH4100> How נֵּחַנְתְּ֙ <WH2603> how gracious בְּבֹא־ <WH935> come לָ֣ךְ חֲבָלִ֔ים <WH2256> shalt thou be when pangs חִ֖יל <WH2427> upon thee the pain כַּיֹּלֵדָֽה׃ <WH3205> as of a woman in travail
